title: 1yel leson これはフォークですか？
content:
[[include credit:start]] **タイトル:** 1yel leson これはフォークですか？ **著者:** ©︎[[*user onthonon]] **作成年:** 2021 [[include credit:end]] +++++ 寿司江はフォークについて聞いているようです。 [[include :snippets:html5player |type=audio |url=http://scp-jp-storage.wikidot.com/local--files/file:2853684-14-jwao/lesson1_1small.mp3]] > [[=image http://scp-jp-storage.wikidot.com/local--files/file:2853684-40-zqar/%E3%83%95%E3%82%A9%E3%83%BC%E3%82%AF%E3%83%9A%E3%83%B3%EF%BC%BF%E9%96%8B%E3%81%91%E3%81%AA%E3%81%84.jpg]] > [[div style="float:left; padding: 0 2%"]] > **Sagara:** hay, ente fOk os. > [[/div]] > [[div style="float:left; width: 45%; padding: 0 2%"]] > [[>]] > **サガラ:** はい、フロントフォークです。 > [[/>]] > [[/div]] > > ~~~~ [[=]] [[table]] [[row]] [[cell style="border: 1px solid black"]] [[table]] [[row]] [[hcell style="border: 1px solid black; background-color: #e1e1e1;" ]] omedo [[/hcell]] [[cell style="border: 1px solid black"]] 〜か [[/cell]] [[cell style="border: 1px solid black"]] [[include :snippets:html5player |type=audio |url=http://scp-jp-storage.wikidot.com/local--files/file:2853684-17-t5p9/omedo.mp3]] [[/cell]] [[/row]] [[row]] [[hcell style="border: 1px solid black; background-color: #e1e1e1;" ]] kalam [[/hcell]] [[cell style="border: 1px solid black"]] ペン [[/cell]] [[cell style="border: 1px solid black"]] [[include :snippets:html5player |type=audio |url=http://scp-jp-storage.wikidot.com/local--files/file:2853684-11-krv9/kalam.mp3]] [[/cell]] [[/row]] [[row]] [[hcell style="border: 1px solid black; background-color: #e1e1e1;" ]] o [[/hcell]] [[cell style="border: 1px solid black"]] 〜だ [[/cell]] [[cell style="border: 1px solid black"]] [[include :snippets:html5player |type=audio |url=http://scp-jp-storage.wikidot.com/local--files/file:2853684-17-v4n8/o.mp3]] [[/cell]] [[/row]] [[row]] [[hcell style="border: 1px solid black; background-color: #e1e1e1;" ]] ao [[/hcell]] [[cell style="border: 1px solid black"]] ある [[/cell]] [[cell style="border: 1px solid black"]] [[include :snippets:html5player |type=audio |url=http://scp-jp-storage.wikidot.com/local--files/file:2853684-4-2emf/ao.mp3]] [[/cell]] [[/row]] [[row]] [[hcell style="border: 1px solid black; background-color: #e1e1e1;" ]] hay [[/hcell]] [[cell style="border: 1px solid black"]] はい [[/cell]] [[cell style="border: 1px solid black"]] [[include :snippets:html5player |type=audio |url=http://scp-jp-storage.wikidot.com/local--files/file:2853684-9-uvt8/hay.mp3]] [[/cell]] [[/row]] [[row]] [[hcell style="border: 1px solid black; background-color: #e1e1e1;" ]] ente [[/hcell]] [[cell style="border: 1px solid black"]] 前、前の [[/cell]] [[cell style="border: 1px solid black"]] [[include :snippets:html5player |type=audio |url=http://scp-jp-storage.wikidot.com/local--files/file:2853684-8-7coe/ente.mp3]] [[/cell]] [[/row]] [[row]] [[hcell style="border: 1px solid black; background-color: #e1e1e1;" ]] ente fOk [[/hcell]] [[cell style="border: 1px solid black"]] フロントフォーク [[/cell]] [[cell style="border: 1px solid black"]] [[include :snippets:html5player |type=audio |url=http://scp-jp-storage.wikidot.com/local--files/file:2853684-7-6c5u/ente_fOk.mp3]] [[/cell]] [[/row]] [[/table]] [[/cell]] [[/row]] [[/table]] [[/=]] [[# 1-1]] ++++ 1. ガ格語尾 ガ格語尾**-(o)y**は、主語を表す「〜は」「〜が」に相当します。子音で終わる単語に付属語を付けるときは子音が連続しないよう、間に(　)内の母音を入れます。 > mori##red|**y**## 馬は > kit##red|**oy**## 猫は [[table]] [[row]] [[cell style="border: 1px solid black"]] [[table]] [[row]] [[hcell style="border: 1px solid black; background-color: #e1e1e1;" ]] mori [[/hcell]] [[cell style="border: 1px solid black"]] 馬 [[/cell]] [[cell style="border: 1px solid black"]] [[include :snippets:html5player |type=audio |url=http://scp-jp-storage.wikidot.com/local--files/file:2853684-15-04kh/mori.mp3]] [[/cell]] [[/row]] [[row]] [[hcell style="border: 1px solid black; background-color: #e1e1e1;" ]] kit [[/hcell]] [[cell style="border: 1px solid black"]] 猫 [[/cell]] [[cell style="border: 1px solid black"]] [[include :snippets:html5player |type=audio |url=http://scp-jp-storage.wikidot.com/local--files/file:2853684-13-h2rz/kit.mp3]] [[/cell]] [[/row]] [[/table]] [[/cell]] [[/row]] [[/table]] [[# 1-2]] ++++ 2. 動詞の語幹 辞書において、動詞や動詞の活用語尾の多くは-oのついた状態で載っています。この形から-oを取り除いた部分を**語幹**と言い、活用する際には語幹にそれぞれの活用語尾を付けます。 > tah-o 食べる > -id-o 〜した [[table]] [[row]] [[cell style="border: 1px solid black"]] [[table]] [[row]] [[hcell style="border: 1px solid black; background-color: #e1e1e1;" ]] taho [[/hcell]] [[cell style="border: 1px solid black"]] 食べる [[/cell]] [[cell style="border: 1px solid black"]] [[include :snippets:html5player |type=audio |url=http://scp-jp-storage.wikidot.com/local--files/file:2853684-23-tzfu/taho.mp3]] [[/cell]] [[/row]] [[/table]] [[/cell]] [[/row]] [[/table]] [[# 1-3]] ++++ 3. 「AはBだ」 「AはBだ」という文はAにガ格語尾を付け、その後にBを置いて、最後に「〜だ」という意味の動詞**o**を置きます。 > Sagaray beksonkuya o. サガラはベクソン人だ。 > > perikoy mane o. リンゴは甘いのだ。 [[table]] [[row]] [[cell style="border: 1px solid black"]] [[table]] [[row]] [[hcell style="border: 1px solid black; background-color: #e1e1e1;" ]] bekson [[/hcell]] [[cell style="border: 1px solid black"]] ベクソン [[/cell]] [[cell style="border: 1px solid black"]] [[include :snippets:html5player |type=audio |url=http://scp-jp-storage.wikidot.com/local--files/file:2853684-7-7qtv/bekson.mp3]] [[/cell]] [[/row]] [[row]] [[hcell style="border: 1px solid black; background-color: #e1e1e1;" ]] kuya [[/hcell]] [[cell style="border: 1px solid black"]] 人 [[/cell]] [[cell style="border: 1px solid black"]] [[include :snippets:html5player |type=audio |url=http://scp-jp-storage.wikidot.com/local--files/file:2853684-14-tbyv/kuya.mp3]] [[/cell]] [[/row]] [[row]] [[hcell style="border: 1px solid black; background-color: #e1e1e1;" ]] beksonkuya [[/hcell]] [[cell style="border: 1px solid black"]] ベクソン人 [[/cell]] [[cell style="border: 1px solid black"]] [[include :snippets:html5player |type=audio |url=http://scp-jp-storage.wikidot.com/local--files/file:2853684-6-l0h3/beksonkuya.mp3]] [[/cell]] [[/row]] [[row]] [[hcell style="border: 1px solid black; background-color: #e1e1e1;" ]] perik [[/hcell]] [[cell style="border: 1px solid black"]] リンゴ [[/cell]] [[cell style="border: 1px solid black"]] [[include :snippets:html5player |type=audio |url=http://scp-jp-storage.wikidot.com/local--files/file:2853684-18-47sq/perik.mp3]] [[/cell]] [[/row]] [[row]] [[hcell style="border: 1px solid black; background-color: #e1e1e1;" ]] mane [[/hcell]] [[cell style="border: 1px solid black"]] 甘い [[/cell]] [[cell style="border: 1px solid black"]] [[include :snippets:html5player |type=audio |url=http://scp-jp-storage.wikidot.com/local--files/file:2853684-15-95on/mane.mp3]] [[/cell]] [[/row]] [[/table]] [[/cell]] [[/row]] [[/table]] 最後に付属語oを置かない場合、「AはB」という文になります。 > Sagaray beksonkuya. サガラはベクソン人。 > > perikoy mane. リンゴは甘い。 [[# 1-4]] ++++ 4. 「Aは〜する」 「Aは〜する」という文もまた、「AはBだ」と同様、Aにガ格語尾を付け、最後に動詞を置きます。 > Sushibladeoy kerito. スシブレードは回る。 [[table]] [[row]] [[cell style="border: 1px solid black"]] [[table]] [[row]] [[hcell style="border: 1px solid black; background-color: #e1e1e1;" ]] Sushiblade [[/hcell]] [[cell style="border: 1px solid black"]] スシブレード [[/cell]] [[cell style="border: 1px solid black"]] [[include :snippets:html5player |type=audio |url=http://scp-jp-storage.wikidot.com/local--files/file:2853684-22-q9aa/sushiblade.mp3]] [[/cell]] [[/row]] [[row]] [[hcell style="border: 1px solid black; background-color: #e1e1e1;" ]] kerito [[/hcell]] [[cell style="border: 1px solid black"]] 回る [[/cell]] [[cell style="border: 1px solid black"]] [[include :snippets:html5player |type=audio |url=http://scp-jp-storage.wikidot.com/local--files/file:2853684-11-z9ef/kerito.mp3]] [[/cell]] [[/row]] [[/table]] [[/cell]] [[/row]] [[/table]] [[# 1-5]] ++++ 5. 疑問(〜か)を表す活用語尾-omedo 疑問文は、動詞やその活用語尾の語幹に疑問(〜か)の活用語尾**-omedo**を付けます。 > Sagaray beksonkuya ##red|**omedo**##? サガラはベクソン人なのか？ > > perikoy mane ##red|**omedo**##? リンゴは甘いか？ > > Sushiey keriz##red|**omedo**##? 寿司江は回すのか？ [[table]] [[row]] [[cell style="border: 1px solid black"]] [[table]] [[row]] [[hcell style="border: 1px solid black; background-color: #e1e1e1;" ]] kerizo [[/hcell]] [[cell style="border: 1px solid black"]] 回す [[/cell]] [[cell style="border: 1px solid black"]] [[include :snippets:html5player |type=audio |url=http://scp-jp-storage.wikidot.com/local--files/file:2853684-12-6755/kerizo.mp3]] [[/cell]] [[/row]] [[/table]] [[/cell]] [[/row]] [[/table]] [[# 1-6]] ++++ 6. です・ます調の活用語尾-os 「〜です」「〜ます」という時は、動詞やその活用語尾の語幹に敬語の活用語尾**-os**を付けます。この活用語尾は主に一番最後に付けられます。 > Sagaray beksonkuya ##red|**os**##. サガラはベクソン人です。 > > Sushibladeoy kerit##red|**os**##. スシブレードは回ります。 > > perikoy mane omed##red|**os**##? リンゴは甘いですか？ [[# 1-7]] ++++ 7. 指示代名詞 指示代名詞は10種類あります。aで終わるものは名詞、eで終わるものは形容詞となります。 **tikira**、**tikire**は話し手の近くの物や人を指します。 > ##red|**tikira**##y perik os. __これ__はリンゴです。 > > ##red|**tikire**## kuyay rosiyakuya. __この__人はロシア人です。 [[table]] [[row]] [[cell style="border: 1px solid black"]] [[table]] [[row]] [[hcell style="border: 1px solid black; background-color: #e1e1e1;" ]] tikira [[/hcell]] [[cell style="border: 1px solid black"]] これ [[/cell]] [[cell style="border: 1px solid black"]] [[include :snippets:html5player |type=audio |url=http://scp-jp-storage.wikidot.com/local--files/file:2853684-29-ekcy/tikira.mp3]] [[/cell]] [[/row]] [[row]] [[hcell style="border: 1px solid black; background-color: #e1e1e1;" ]] tikire [[/hcell]] [[cell style="border: 1px solid black"]] この [[/cell]] [[cell style="border: 1px solid black"]] [[include :snippets:html5player |type=audio |url=http://scp-jp-storage.wikidot.com/local--files/file:2853684-28-hjnb/tikire.mp3]] [[/cell]] [[/row]] [[row]] [[hcell style="border: 1px solid black; background-color: #e1e1e1;" ]] rosiya [[/hcell]] [[cell style="border: 1px solid black"]] ロシア [[/cell]] [[cell style="border: 1px solid black"]] [[include :snippets:html5player |type=audio |url=http://scp-jp-storage.wikidot.com/local--files/file:2853684-21-icwa/rosiya.mp3]] [[/cell]] [[/row]] [[row]] [[hcell style="border: 1px solid black; background-color: #e1e1e1;" ]] rosiyakuya [[/hcell]] [[cell style="border: 1px solid black"]] ロシア人 [[/cell]] [[cell style="border: 1px solid black"]] [[include :snippets:html5player |type=audio |url=http://scp-jp-storage.wikidot.com/local--files/file:2853684-20-e4l8/rosiyakuya.mp3]] [[/cell]] [[/row]] [[/table]] [[/cell]] [[/row]] [[/table]] **tisara**、**tisare**は聞き手の近くの物や話し手から遠くの人や物を指します。 > ##red|**tasara**##y sushi os. __それ/あれ__は寿司です。 > > ##red|**tisare**## fOkoy kalam os. __その/あの__フォークはペンです。 > @@@@ [[table]] [[row]] [[cell style="border: 1px solid black"]] [[table]] [[row]] [[hcell style="border: 1px solid black; background-color: #e1e1e1;" ]] tisara [[/hcell]] [[cell style="border: 1px solid black"]] それ、あれ [[/cell]] [[cell style="border: 1px solid black"]] [[include :snippets:html5player |type=audio |url=http://scp-jp-storage.wikidot.com/local--files/file:2853684-34-zmta/tisara.mp3]] [[/cell]] [[/row]] [[row]] [[hcell style="border: 1px solid black; background-color: #e1e1e1;" ]] tisare [[/hcell]] [[cell style="border: 1px solid black"]] その、あの [[/cell]] [[cell style="border: 1px solid black"]] [[include :snippets:html5player |type=audio |url=http://scp-jp-storage.wikidot.com/local--files/file:2853684-36-x2nu/tisare.mp3]] [[/cell]] [[/row]] [[row]] [[hcell style="border: 1px solid black; background-color: #e1e1e1;" ]] sushi [[/hcell]] [[cell style="border: 1px solid black"]] 寿司 [[/cell]] [[cell style="border: 1px solid black"]] [[include :snippets:html5player |type=audio |url=http://scp-jp-storage.wikidot.com/local--files/file:2853684-22-1pn5/sushi.mp3]] [[/cell]] [[/row]] [[/table]] [[/cell]] [[/row]] [[/table]] **timara**、**timare**は互いが知っている人や物、思い出せない人や物、不明瞭な人や物を指します。 > ##red|**timara**##y nao. __あれ__がない。 > > ##red|**timare**## kuyay kIlo. __ある__人は言う。 > [[table]] [[row]] [[cell style="border: 1px solid black"]] [[table]] [[row]] [[hcell style="border: 1px solid black; background-color: #e1e1e1;" ]] timara [[/hcell]] [[cell style="border: 1px solid black"]] [[[http://scp-jp.wikidot.com/scp-thingy-ko-j|アレ]]]、何らか [[/cell]] [[cell style="border: 1px solid black"]] [[include :snippets:html5player |type=audio |url=http://scp-jp-storage.wikidot.com/local--files/file:2853684-30-28qq/timara.mp3]] [[/cell]] [[/row]] [[row]] [[hcell style="border: 1px solid black; background-color: #e1e1e1;" ]] timare [[/hcell]] [[cell style="border: 1px solid black"]] ある、とある、某、何らかの [[/cell]] [[cell style="border: 1px solid black"]] [[include :snippets:html5player |type=audio |url=http://scp-jp-storage.wikidot.com/local--files/file:2853684-33-vch3/timare.mp3]] [[/cell]] [[/row]] [[row]] [[hcell style="border: 1px solid black; background-color: #e1e1e1;" ]] nao [[/hcell]] [[cell style="border: 1px solid black"]] ない [[/cell]] [[cell style="border: 1px solid black"]] [[include :snippets:html5player |type=audio |url=http://scp-jp-storage.wikidot.com/local--files/file:2853684-16-u4mo/nao.mp3]] [[/cell]] [[/row]] [[row]] [[hcell style="border: 1px solid black; background-color: #e1e1e1;" ]] kIlo [[/hcell]] [[cell style="border: 1px solid black"]] 言う、話す [[/cell]] [[cell style="border: 1px solid black"]] [[include :snippets:html5player |type=audio |url=http://scp-jp-storage.wikidot.com/local--files/file:2853684-12-mk3m/kIlo.mp3]] [[/cell]] [[/row]] [[/table]] [[/cell]] [[/row]] [[/table]] **tiyana**、**tiyane**は選択肢の中から選ばれる人や物を指します。他の単語の前にtiyaneを置くことで疑問詞を作ります。 > ##red|**tiyana**##y yade omedos? __どれ__が好きですか？ > > ##red|**tiyane**## fOkoy kalam omedos? __どの__フォークがペンですか？ > @@@@ [[table]] [[row]] [[cell style="border: 1px solid black"]] [[table]] [[row]] [[hcell style="border: 1px solid black; background-color: #e1e1e1;" ]] tiyana [[/hcell]] [[cell style="border: 1px solid black"]] どれ [[/cell]] [[cell style="border: 1px solid black"]] [[include :snippets:html5player |type=audio |url=http://scp-jp-storage.wikidot.com/local--files/file:2853684-37-1kjt/tiyana.mp3]] [[/cell]] [[/row]] [[row]] [[hcell style="border: 1px solid black; background-color: #e1e1e1;" ]] tiyane [[/hcell]] [[cell style="border: 1px solid black"]] どの [[/cell]] [[cell style="border: 1px solid black"]] [[include :snippets:html5player |type=audio |url=http://scp-jp-storage.wikidot.com/local--files/file:2853684-38-wygg/tiyane.mp3]] [[/cell]] [[/row]] [[row]] [[hcell style="border: 1px solid black; background-color: #e1e1e1;" ]] yade [[/hcell]] [[cell style="border: 1px solid black"]] 好き [[/cell]] [[cell style="border: 1px solid black"]] [[include :snippets:html5player |type=audio |url=http://scp-jp-storage.wikidot.com/local--files/file:2853684-38-bpjm/yade.mp3]] [[/cell]] [[/row]] [[/table]] [[/cell]] [[/row]] [[/table]] **tiaka**、**tiake**は選択肢のない中から選ばれる人や物を指します。他の単語の前にtiakeを置くことで疑問詞を作ります。 > ##red|**tiaka**##y aomedos? __何__がありますか？ > > tisare kuyay ##red|**tiake**## kuya omedos? あの人は__何__者/誰ですか？ [[table]] [[row]] [[cell style="border: 1px solid black"]] [[table]] [[row]] [[hcell style="border: 1px solid black; background-color: #e1e1e1;" ]] tiaka [[/hcell]] [[cell style="border: 1px solid black"]] 何 [[/cell]] [[cell style="border: 1px solid black"]] [[include :snippets:html5player |type=audio |url=http://scp-jp-storage.wikidot.com/local--files/file:2853684-26-4h2t/tiaka.mp3]] [[/cell]] [[/row]] [[row]] [[hcell style="border: 1px solid black; background-color: #e1e1e1;" ]] tiake [[/hcell]] [[cell style="border: 1px solid black"]] 何の、何、どの、どう [[/cell]] [[cell style="border: 1px solid black"]] [[include :snippets:html5player |type=audio |url=http://scp-jp-storage.wikidot.com/local--files/file:2853684-31-jr47/tiake.mp3]] [[/cell]] [[/row]] [[/table]] [[/cell]] [[/row]] [[/table]] [[# 1-sadanistemtoru]] + 練習問題 ++++ 1. □に適切な単語を入れましょう。 [[HTML]]
  1. inyAnyay paba .
    知は力なり
